name: Omid'S GitHub
body:
# Welcome to My GitHub

## Projects
### Quick SSVEP
Quick SSVEP is a web-based application that provides easy to setup SSVEP (Steady State Visually Evoked Potential) stimulation interfaces.

[![Click to run it](https://github.com/OmidS/quickssvep/raw/master/img/play.png) Run it!](https://omids.github.io/quickssvep/)

[![Source](https://github.com/themes/merlot/images/octocat.png) Source](https://github.com/OmidS/quickssvep)

### Onlinify
A MATLAB toolbox for online analysis of EEG data recorded with [BCI2000](http://www.schalklab.org/research/bci2000). It uses [Fieldtrip Buffer](http://www.fieldtriptoolbox.org/) to transfer data to MATLAB in real-time. 

[![Source](https://github.com/themes/merlot/images/octocat.png) Source](https://github.com/OmidS/onlinify)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
